document_data.mainbody:
Simples Street was a hard-packed dirt and gravel paved street in the Trades Ward of Waterdeep.
This street opened south off of the courtyard Virgins Square, then ran from east to west. At its western end the street terminated on Snail Street, while its eastern end terminated on the Way of the Dragon.
Bowels of the Earth a dive bar on the corner of Simples Street and Snail Street.
